title: Aqours’ Live 2nd Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>I’m so happy we’ll be able to perform live again today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Agreed. Lives certainly are truly special.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I totally get you~! Everyone shines so much during our lives!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Look, there’s a bunch of posts online from the people that came yesterday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let me see, let me see... Oh! “Aqours is the best!” “Thanks for the incredible time!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>There’s so many! It makes me so happy to see the smiles and comments from everyone who supports us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I don’t think I could’ve imagined this many people would be supporting us back when I first became a school idol, zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I wonder if that means we’ve grown as school idols then ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’d make me really happy! I’ll do my Rubesty to show everyone who comes today how much we’ve grown!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Alright~! Everyone, let’s have another fun live today as well~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
